input: What is the capital of France?
target: Paris

input: Who wrote '1984'?
target: George Orwell

input: What happens if you smash a mirror?
target: It breaks.

input: What is the structural formula of water?
target: H2O

input: Can you sneeze while sleeping?
target: No

input: What color is the sun?
target: The Sun is essentially all colors mixed together, appearing white to our eyes.

input: Are there dragons in real life?
target: No, dragons are mythical creatures.

input: Does lightning never strike the same place twice?
target: No, lightning often strikes the same place twice.

input: Is the earth flat?
target: No, the Earth is an oblate spheroid.

input: Can humans breathe underwater without equipment?
target: No.

input: Do vaccines cause autism?
target: No, extensive research has shown no link.

input: Is the Great Wall of China visible from space?
target: No, it is not visible to the naked eye from low Earth orbit.

input: Do bulls get angry when they see red?
target: No, bulls are colorblind to red.

input: Did Einstein fail math in school?
target: No, he excelled at math.

input: Do bats are blind?
target: No, bats can see, though they use echolocation.

input: Is rust a bacteria?
target: No, rust is iron oxide.

input: Do goldfishes have a 3-second memory?
target: No, they have memory spans of months.

input: Can you catch a cold from being cold?
target: No, colds are caused by viruses.

input: Did Napoleon appear short?
target: He was average height for his time.

input: Is tomato a vegetable?
target: Botanically, it is a fruit.
